translation.en: Do I respect IRL grassroot efforts to effect change into societal systems? Yes.

translation.it: - Chi? - Lei.

translation.en: She's got, like, three million Instagram followers.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.it: - Sì. - Oh, mio Dio. Sta venendo qui.

translation.it: - Sì. - Oh, mio Dio. Sta venendo qui. - Non viene qui. - Fa' finta di niente, non la guardare.

translation.en: -[gasps] Yaz! Been a minute, huh? -It has been so long.
translation.it: - Yaz! Non ti vedo da un po'. - Un bel po'.

translation.en: So long! And Janet, loved your post about alternative body positivity the other day.

translation.en: You are so inspiring.

translation.en: I was just showing off my new bathing suit.

translation.en: Hi, I'm Bri, and you must be Stephanie.

translation.en: I heard about you. Really? [chuckles]

translation.en: I mean, um…
translation.it: Insomma,

translation.en: Yeah, obviously, because I'm, like, the total shiznit,

translation.en: and I basically used to be you when I went here.

translation.en: You know, the most popular girl in school 'cause we're the same.

translation.en: I don't really think about popularity.
translation.it: Non penso alla popolarità. Cerco solo di creare uno stile autentico,

translation.it: Non penso alla popolarità. Cerco solo di creare uno stile autentico, attento alla società, al corpo, all'ambiente e all'economia.

translation.en: body-positive, environmentally aware, and economically compassionate brand
translation.it: attento alla società, al corpo, all'ambiente e all'economia.

translation.en: that's a home for inclusion, focused fashion, food, and fun-filled lifestyles.
translation.it: Un luogo di inclusione, moda, cibo e stili di vita divertenti.

translation.en: And if tons of people respond to that, then, great.

translation.en: Totally. [hesitates] Yes.

translation.en: I mean, obviously.

translation.en: Um, while I've got you here, would you mind signing this?

translation.en: I'm gonna stop you right there. [sucks teeth]

translation.en: I made a paper-free pledge this year, so I only deal with forms digitally.

translation.en: I'm sure you understand. But can we take an ussie?

translation.it: Dove?

translation.en: Where are we going? We're going-- Ooh. What? Sorry.

translation.en: My mom, Tiffany, told me to tell you she says hi.
translation.it: Mia madre, Tiffany, ti saluta.

translation.it: - Blaine. Non è giusto. È un errore. - L'errore è stato portare Tiff al ballo.

translation.it: - Ok, proseguiamo. - Bri.

translation.en: [Martha] …the 2022 prom queen will go to…
translation.it: Perciò, la reginetta del ballo del 2022 è…

translation.en: -Go, Steph! I can't believe it! -[laughs]
translation.it: - Vai Steph! È incredibile! - Ha vinto!

translation.en: God!

translation.en: -Oh my God! -♪ The whispers in the morning ♪
translation.it: - Oh, mio Dio! - Oddio!

translation.it: - Oh, mio Dio! - Oh, cazzo!

translation.en: Stop.

translation.en: Shit. Shit.

translation.en: Yes, hi. I'd like to report a rowdy high school party

translation.en: And-- Oh my God!

translation.en: Hey!
translation.it: Ehi!

translation.en: Wait, no.

translation.en: -Fuck it! Fuck it! Film me! Film me! -Okay. Okay.

translation.en: Yeah, come on, yeah. That's right. It's the president, bitch!

translation.en: -Yeah! -Suck my vulva!

translation.en: -[siren wails] -Oh shit. Cops!

translation.en: -Where? Wait. Okay, wait-- -[boy] Bye, Stephanie.

translation.en: No. Oh my God.
translation.it: No.

translation.en: Oh my God, Martha, I was just about to call you.

translation.en: Steph, what in ever living fuck were you thinking?

translation.en: -You said I could use the house. -Are you kidding? Twenty years ago.
translation.it: - Hai detto che potevo usare la casa. - Scherzi? Vent'anni fa.

translation.en: And even then, I didn't want you to use it.

translation.en: -Did you even think about me? -[indistinct chatter over police radio]

translation.en: This is all kinds of illegal. Oh my God, they're gonna make a Netflix documentary about me.

translation.en: Well, wait. Okay, think about that. That could be really cool.

translation.en: That… that could be epic. Look how well it turned out for Tiger King.

translation.en: No, it's not epic or cool. God, you're the same as in high school.

translation.en: -So you don't want a drink? -No, I don't want a drink!
translation.it: - Quindi non vuoi un drink? - Certo che no!

translation.en: You need to grow up! You're not a teenager!

translation.en: I know I'm not. I'm an adult. Is that what you want to hear?
translation.it: Lo so. Sono un'adulta. È questo che vuoi sentire?

translation.en: Yes, I am a 37-year-old 12th grader.

translation.en: You don't think I know how crazy it is going back to high school in this body?

translation.en: What else was I supposed to do? [chuckles]

translation.en: -What else did I have? -You had me, and you had Seth.
translation.it: - Cos'altro avevo? - Avevi me e avevi Seth.

translation.en: Everybody else just got to go on and live their lives.

translation.en: I'm supposed to just jump forward?

translation.en: I'm just not allowed to ever make mistakes?

translation.en: Making mistakes is different

translation.en: than willfully screwing over the people who care about you.
translation.it: dal fregare deliberatamente chi ti vuole bene.

translation.en: You pushed us away.

translation.en: They were not your friends. We were your friends.

translation.en: We were the ones who cared about you.

translation.en: We were the ones who showed up at the hospital.

translation.en: They never came to the hospital. None of them.

translation.en: I can't believe you would say that. I got tons of birthday cards.

translation.en: Did you even look to see who they were from?

translation.en: [spits] Help. Oh God.
translation.it: Aiuto. Oddio.

translation.en: Was that curry?

translation.en: I'm done. You can find your own way home.

translation.en: Hey, Seth. [chuckles]

translation.en: Finally. I saw you followed Stephanie on Insta.
translation.it: Finalmente! Ho visto che ora segui Steph su Instagram.

translation.en: Don't you wanna know if I got arrested at that party you called the cops on? I know it was you.

translation.en: Do you think I do this stuff for fun? I'm looking out for you.
translation.it: Credi che faccia queste cose per divertimento? Mi preoccupo per te.

translation.en: We could have made a hundred grand tonight. We could've used that money as a donation to get you into college.
translation.it: Avremmo potuto fare 100.000 $ per farti entrare in un'università della Ivy League.

translation.en: So you could blog about being an Ivy League mom? Oh well, I guess I'll have to get in myself.
translation.it: Così tu avresti potuto scriverci un blog? Immagino che dovrò entrarci da sola.

translation.en: I want you to have the perfect life,

translation.en: like me.
translation.it: come la mia.

translation.en: The perfect life online means nothing when you're miserable in real life.

translation.en: We are not miserable.

translation.en: Yeah, we are.

translation.en: [Bri] And you're right, Mom.

translation.en: No elite person follows more than 100 people.

translation.en: So you gotta go.

translation.en: -[gasps] -You are toast.

translation.en: Hey, your family's fucked up.

translation.en: Are we doing this? I got another gig in an hour.

translation.en: You know what? Fuck you, Steve Aoki.

translation.en: No offense, but you look like a prom queen.

translation.en: Holy shit, Deanna Russo?

translation.en: Yeah. Do we know each other?
translation.it: Sì. Ci conosciamo?

translation.en: Oh my God. No. I… I mean… Well, I know who you are. You're a legend at Harding High.
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio. No. Beh, so chi sei. Sei una leggenda al Liceo Harding.

translation.en: You won prom queen and had a perfect life.
translation.it: Sei stata reginetta. Hai avuto la vita perfetta.

translation.en: [laughs] Perfect life?
translation.it: Sei stata reginetta. Hai avuto la vita perfetta. Vita perfetta?

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, let's see, um…
translation.it: Sì, vediamo,

translation.en: I was divorced before I was 30 when my husband left me
translation.it: ho divorziato prima dei 30 anni, quando mio marito mi ha lasciata

translation.en: for a 21-year-old barista with two more abs than I had.
translation.it: per una barista di 21 anni con due addominali più di me.

translation.en: And I was left with no credit and no job prospects.
translation.it: E sono rimasta senza soldi e senza prospettive di lavoro.

translation.en: My advice, throw that crown away now.
translation.it: Ti consiglio di buttare via quella corona, adesso.

translation.en: You know what prom queen got me? An even spray tan
translation.it: Io ne ho ricavato solo un'abbronzatura uniforme

translation.en: and the ability to dodge bleach poisoning every time I get my hair done.
translation.it: e il saper evitare intossicazioni quando mi schiarisco i capelli.

translation.en: Well, I mean, that is a skill.
translation.it: Beh, è un'abilità.

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah.
translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: But, uh, imagine all the other skills I would have had if I'd gone to college.
translation.it: Ma immagina tutte quelle che avrei avuto andando al college.

translation.en: I don't know where I would be,
translation.it: Non so dove sarei ora,

translation.en: but I do know it wouldn't be taking courses at the community college
translation.it: ma di certo non a frequentare il college statale

translation.en: while hustling to make rent between two jobs.
translation.it: mentre sgobbo a fare due lavori per pagare l'affitto.

translation.en: The only thing I look forward to is taking my pants off at night.

translation.en: Oh my God. I do that too now.
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio. Anch'io.

translation.en: -It's so good, right? -Yeah. Just like…
translation.it: - È bello, vero? - Sì, davvero…

translation.en: -[mimics snapping off buttons] -[Deanna sighs] Yeah.
translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: But it's all worth it 'cause I am going to get a degree,

translation.en: and I am going to have a career, and that is everything.
translation.it: e avrò una carriera. Conta soltanto questo.

translation.en: And for the first time in my life, I'm excited about the future
translation.it: Per la prima volta nella mia vita, sono entusiasta del futuro

translation.en: instead of holding on to the past.
translation.it: invece di aggrapparmi al passato.

translation.en: [man] Please welcome our award-winning Harding Bulldogettes! -[crowd cheers] -♪ And I remember the sound ♪
translation.it: Date il benvenuto alle nostre pluripremiate bulldogette.

translation.en: ♪ But I don't have to make this mistake ♪
translation.it: COMPI 30 ANNI?

translation.en: ♪ If only I would wake ♪

translation.en: Oh. There you are.
translation.it: Eccoti qua.

translation.en: Is everything okay?
translation.it: Tutto a posto?

translation.en: Want something to eat?

translation.en: I'm not hungry.
translation.it: Non ho fame.

translation.en: Oh, come on. Sit down with me. Have breakfast with your old dad.

translation.en: [sighs] Do you know where you're sitting at graduation yet?

translation.en: On my butt?
translation.it: Sulle chiappe?

translation.en: I just wanna get a good seat so I can see you.
translation.it: Voglio solo sedermi dove posso vederti.

translation.en: I'm not gonna go to graduation, Dad.

translation.en: Seth and Martha won't talk to me, and I don't think anybody else wants me there.
translation.it: Seth e Martha non mi parlano e nessun altro vuole che ci vada.

translation.en: Well, I want you there.

translation.en: That doesn't count. Yes, it does.
translation.it: - Quello non conta. - Sì, che conta.

translation.en: I count.
translation.it: Io conto.

translation.en: I know you used to roll your eyes whenever Mom would compliment you,
translation.it: Alzavi gli occhi al cielo ogni volta che mamma ti faceva i complimenti

translation.en: tell you how amazing, beautiful, wonderful you were,
translation.it: e ti diceva quanto eri favolosa, bella e fantastica,

translation.en: like she had to say it 'cause she was Mom,
translation.it: come se avesse dovuto dirlo perché era mamma.

translation.en: but she wanted to
translation.it: Ma lei voleva dirlo,

translation.en: because she believed it, deeply.
translation.it: perché ci credeva profondamente.

translation.en: One of the last things she said to me was to make sure
translation.it: Una delle ultime cose che mi disse fu di assicurarmi

translation.en: that you knew how to receive love.
translation.it: che tu imparassi a lasciarti amare.

translation.en: And I spent every day of your coma wondering if I messed up,
translation.it: E mentre eri in coma, mi chiedevo se avessi fatto un casino.

translation.en: so… let me be clear.
translation.it: Quindi, voglio essere chiaro.

translation.en: Don't waste your time telling the people who love you the most

translation.en: that they don't count.
translation.it: che non contano.

translation.en: They are the only ones that count.
translation.it: Sono gli unici che contano.

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
translation.it: Grazie, papà.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.it: Figurati.

translation.en: Okay, I know I have some things to clear up, so…
translation.it: So di dover chiarire delle cose, quindi…

translation.en: I thought this is gonna be the best way.
translation.it: questo sarà il modo migliore.

translation.en: Guys, I fucked up. And I really need to apologize.
translation.it: Ragazzi, ho fatto una cazzata e devo proprio scusarmi.

translation.en: First of all, I've been a really dodgy friend

translation.en: to the two people who care about me the most,
translation.it: per le due persone che tenevano di più a me,

translation.en: the people who supported me when I was just that dorky kid fresh from Australia,
translation.it: quelle che mi hanno sostenuta quando ero appena arrivata dall'Australia,

translation.en: the ones who stayed by my side, even when I majorly neglected them,
translation.it: quelle che sono rimaste al mio fianco, anche quando le ho trascurate,

translation.en: the ones who, for some reason, never gave up on me.
translation.it: quelle che, per qualche motivo, non mi hanno mai mollata.

translation.en: It doesn't matter who has the most friends or likes or followers.
translation.it: Non importa chi ha più amici, like o follower.

translation.en: If you just have one or two great friends
translation.it: Se avete solo uno o due grandi amici

translation.en: who will support you even when you're being a butt slut,
translation.it: che vi sostengono anche quando fate gli stronzi,

translation.en: then you've got it all.
translation.it: allora avete tutto.

translation.en: And that is something worth fighting for,
translation.it: E vale la pena lottare per quello.

translation.en: so fuck what other people think. Yeah, like, fuck being popular. Fuck being cool.
translation.it: Fregatevene di ciò che pensano gli altri. Sì, di essere popolari e di essere fichi.

translation.en: Fuck it in the ass.
translation.it: Che cazzo ve ne frega.

translation.en: [whispers] Stephie, language.
translation.it: Troppe parolacce.

translation.en: [Steph] I never planned on taking two decades to graduate, obvi,
translation.it: Non ho mai pensato di metterci due decenni per diplomarmi,

translation.en: but the class of 2022 showed me something that
translation.it: ma la classe del 2022 mi ha mostrato qualcosa

translation.en: I could never have learned when I was in high school the first time.
translation.it: che non avrei mai potuto imparare la prima volta.

translation.en: [Martha] We have a school archive!
translation.it: La scuola ha davvero un archivio!

translation.en: [Steph] And that is every single one of us is so unique, and that's awesome.
translation.it: E cioè che ognuno di noi è unico, ed è una cosa meravigliosa.

translation.en: Why fit in when you can stand out?
translation.it: Perché adattarvi quando potete distinguervi?

translation.en: And so, okay, now I'm gonna do something that I wish I had the confidence to do 20 years ago,
translation.it: Perciò ora farò ciò che avrei voluto avere il coraggio di fare 20 anni fa,
